post.body: In Vegas, there's a Marshalls in my 'hood. Convenient. For TJ Maxx, I frequent one near the university. Great selection.
You're in Sin City? Well, you know who to ask if you wonder where to go to shop, shop, shop! Have fun. Stay outta trouble.
I am all over atheist cartoons. Thanks for introducing! http://www.atheistcartoons.com/
You are so wrong! But, I DARE you!!!
Awww. Sweetheart, don't be a sad panda. Remind that c**t that carrots are wonderful for plumping breasts. She probably needs it.
I'm more of a Heat Miser fan. Ever notice how Heat Miser looks like Danny Bonnaducci? Or visa versa?
@TinaTangDesigns Y'all are right. After the new year, I vow to take a small staycation. This girl needs a break.
You would think I would take that time off. But I didn't request it. I'm a glutton for punishment. Workaholic maybe?
Drunk scrabble? LOVES it! I gotta try that. Sometimes we do naked Twister.
Wait. A brain to play Cranium? I thought all I needed was some Grey Goose?
I wanna go home, too! I have snow hangover. ;)
@VegasGeek @stephanielasure @stagewmn @dudieboy and Bob (wherever he is) thnx 4 SMC meeting last nite. Sorry about the no shows.
No WP. Still using Blogger, but now using CDN sans "blogspot" in url. Fixed Blog Roll. I *think* I got everyone.
Sadly. Blogroll is completely gone from editor side of it, too. Hoping I remember everyone who was on it before.
I don't know. I switched to my custom doman name and @Tara_Bear is confirming probs arise when u do that w/Blogger. *Sigh.*
I know! Totally excited. I predict cosmetic co's will be adding this drug to mascaras in 2009!
Adventures in shopping at TJ Maxx and Marshalls: http://tinyurl.com/6o28j4
I love bargains! Must re-tweet: @hayden_harnett Over 65 items under $50 - Our Wishful Sale is holiday heaven - http://tinyurl.com/5qc2cm
If you're shopping Macy's this weekend, be sure to take this coupon with you: http://tinyurl.com/5t4fzg
Sephora's Mistletoe Makeover - you can win cosmetics! http://www.mistletoemakeover.com/
Vegas shoppers: 30% off sale @ A/X Armani Exchange @ Town Square.
Via Spiga at Rue La La. HOT! Shoes as low as $78. Bags as low as $98. Must see.
Save up to 70% on select designer apparel, etc. at Saks 5th: http://tinyurl.com/5erdf5 Free shipping and gift box w/code: SFAGIFT
Free shipping for purchases over $25 at Delias.com. Code: DWRW25
http://twitpic.com/saro - I thought Bob hated me. We always argue. Then he gives me this fabulous handbag cookie jar for the holidays. M ...
Thank you Pandora for playing White Lines....
So, it looks like most everyone thinks the hood thong is worse than the snuggie. Except @badbeatclothing who got a hoodthong for his gf. ;)
Style morality debate: Which is worse? The hood thong http://www.hoodthong.com/ or the snuggie https://www.getsnuggie.com
Uh oh. There's fudge in the office.
Vegas: Steve Madden store @ Town Square is giving you a mini wallet w/purchase of $75 gift card.
I have over 60 hours of PTO. TOTALLY should have taken this week off!!!
Work is causing me to flip out. Remain calm. Breathe...
Last-minute holiday shopping: http://tinyurl.com/99q7sh
http://twitpic.com/udgh - Another photo from snow day in Las Vegas, 12/17/08. This one is in front of my office.
I got a Cranium. Woo-hoo!!!
Oh! Time for dept. gift exchange. Let's see what I get!!!
Tory Burch sale: Add'l 20% off "winter sale" items, plus $10 overnite shipping. Code: ELF08. http://tinyurl.com/3w6wk2
WAhhhhh!!!! My blog roll as magically disappeared!!! I am SO irritated.
I am for anything that give me fuller lashes! http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/28073316/
Vegas shoppers: 7pm - closing tonight, @ Off 5th, buy 1 cashmere sweater, get 2 FREE.
